altername_name: pc原人シリーズ PC電人 Punkic Cyborgs
pc原人シリーズ PC電人 Punkic Cyborgs
name: Air Zonk
overview: The Evil King Drool has sent forth powerful cyber robots to carry out his evil designs. But a team of cool, sunglass-wearing warriors lead by Zonk have discovered his plot and have risen against him. In hopes of defeating this team, King Drool sends wave after wave of terrible cyber robots. But by combining their power, Zonk and his friends can destroy even the worst of the cyber robots. Get ready! The fight is about to begin!
